name: Saving BEN - DEMO
description:
(In Development) -  Playable DEMO

Saving BEN will be an Adventure game wich will combine  Top-Down 2D and Platformer gameplay  and mix it with some combat!

Developed for  the Nintendo Game Boy console 

The next UPDATE will feature combat, different enemies and complete levels!

Thanks for your support!

BUSTED VAN STUDIOS 2021
